thread.section_title: Ibis London Stratford - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very good nights sleep
thread.title_full: Very good nights sleep - Review of Ibis London Stratford, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jean N
title: Very good nights sleep
text:
Went to a concert at the 02 and stayed overnight here very pleasant and helpful staff very nice comfortable bed late check out time of 12 mid day nice clean and tidy room lovely shower cubicle tea and coffee making facilities, hair dryer and even an iron
Room Tip: Not great views but didn't need to look out the window See more room tips Green Features: Not sure about any environmentally friendly practices at this hotel the room I stayed in was noisy if you had the window open but ok with window shut
